es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow
Class ThreadMergeFlow

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.SimulationObject
      es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.BasicFlow
          es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.SingleSuccessorFlow
              es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.MergeFlow
                  es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.ANDJoinFlow
                      es.ull.iis.simulation.sequential.flow.ThreadMergeFlow
All Implemented Interfaces:
ANDJoinFlow, FinalizerFlow, Flow, JoinFlow, MergeFlow, SingleSuccessorFlow, ThreadMergeFlow, Identifiable, SimulationObject, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>
public class ThreadMergeFlow
extends ANDJoinFlow
implements ThreadMergeFlow

A flow which merges a specified amount of work threads. It should be used with its counterpart, the Thread Split pattern (WFP 42). Meets the Thread Merge pattern (WFP 41), but has also extra features. Works as a thread discriminator, if acceptValue is set to 1; or as a thread partial join if any other value greater than one and lower than nInstances is used.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez
